title: (x) Staging Solutions baroque script logo - Vivaldi {Yves}
content:
Hi,  
I think I posted my last request incorrectly... I am looking for help identifying the attached typeface. Any info would be appreciated.  
Thanks  
Lori

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829113127im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Typeface.jpg)

 [‹ RTP logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829113127/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19456 "Go to previous forum topic") [Doctor Who New Series ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829113127/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19438 "Go to next forum topic")
author: LorianneMayo

comments.content: This is very strange the attached sample is not the sample that I attached. I’ll try to attach my actual sample again.
In the database is a picture that uses the same name as yours! just rename yours and upload it again! Then it will work!

There should probably be a note in the FAQ about naming your images something unique before posting them... This happened to me too, the first time I added an image. Unless you know how the site treats the files, there’s no reason not to name your image something generic like “sample.jpg”.

\> naming your images something unique

That’s not a good solution.  
The old system assigned sequential numbers to posted images, so no confusion was possible. In this new filename-based setup, maybe a good tweak would be for the system to append (I would prefix) the username (which is unique) to the filename.

hhp

\> maybe a good tweak would be for the system to append (I would prefix) the username (which is unique) to the filename

That would be very elegant. Is there a reason it’s not being done that way already?

Thanks very much for the advice. I’ve renamed the file and will post it again.  
Lori

We’re looking at a very nastily bitmapped [Vivaldi](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829113127/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=8&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=vivaldi&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=Staging+Solutions).

BTW I know the new filename-based uploading system sucks big time. I really don’t have a clue why they changed and it constantly creates confusion (oooh what a nice alliteration :^P) I’m not sure if this is being addressed, but I’ll check with the codemeister.

Dear Bald Condensed,  
Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!!  
The minute I read it I knew you were right!!!  
I’ll refer this website to all my friends!!!  
Lori

PS, yes very nastily bitmapped!! and you’re right, I never was able to post anything with my messages. I saved to a gif file and jpg, and named it something arcane, but the system kept telling me it couldn’t find the file. Is there a trick to posting a sample? I’d like to be able to use this forum again.  
Thanks!
